label: [supervisor] inform user if config needs updating
info: [Share link](https://flows.red-erik.org/f/f47f7da6ad1183ed) ## Supervisor confguration error Sometimes the list of nodes that a supervisor is supervising becomes corrupt because nodes disappear. Here the supervisor: 4 is configured to supervise four nodes but one was removed *without* updating supervisors configuration. Deploying this flow will cause an error message to be show in the debug panel. supervisor: 1 also errors out because it is configured to supervise supervisor: 4 but that node never comes online. So it is also missing a node to be configured correctly.
